helpContent_App:
With this application, you can search for the nearest service store around you.

This application will display information about the shop that you want to go.
helpContent_Chat:
To be able send a message to the service owner, you must sign in to your account or create the new one if you don't have. 
1. Choose between available services in Home Screen or Nearby Screen
2.Tap 'Owner Info' and tap 'Send Message' to send message to the selected owner.
helpContent_Store:
To be able to add your own services. First, sign in to your account or create the new one if you don't have.

1. Go to Settings Tab
2. In service section, choose 'Add Service' and the form will appear on the screen
3. Fill the given form and tap 'Submit'
